title: ESS-3085 Essentials by OFM Racing Style Leather Gaming Chair
description:
Ergonomic race car style design: luxury and comfort whether used during intense gaming sessions or long workdays
Contoured segmented padding, integrated headrest, and padded arms provide quality support hour after hour
Flip-up Arms: leave padded arms down for upper body comfort or move out of the way for uninhibited mobility
Features height adjustment, center-tilt and tilt-tension control and 360-swivel
Upholstered in SofThread Leather and contrasting green mesh for a sleek look and comfortable feel
Seat Size: 20" W x 18.875" D
Back Size: 19.75” W x 29.50” H
Seat Height: 17” - 20.75”
Overall Height: 44.50" - 48.25"
Overall Width: 28.125"
Overall Depth: 30.375"
